short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps streamers accept challenges from twitch subscribers on lichess.org!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to filter challenges when playing chess on Lichess.org. You can filter by casual / rated games, variant challenges, time control, and more! There is also an option to select a random challenger, or to select a random challenger who is subscribed to you on Twitch.
